metadata.name: Emma Rodriguez Headshot
metadata.notes: Photorealistic headshot for Emma Rodriguez (Agency Operations Director, 40s)

theme.concept: professional business headshot of a confident woman in her 40s with warm expression

composition.visual_flow: focused on subject with natural eye contact
